|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ===Product Key Features=== *[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 ''(’‘Cascade’’)'' *Mini PCI Express 2.0 interface *2.4GHz max 20dBm output power (per chain) *802.11ac compliant & backward compatible with 802.11bgn (up to 800Mbps) *Multi-user MIMO (MU-MIMO) beamformer *Heat sink allows free air operation *Supports Spatial Multiplexing, Cyclic-Delay Diversity (CDD), Low-Density Parity Check (LDPC) Codes, Maximal Ratio Combining (MRC), Space Time Block Code (STBC) *Supports Dynamic Frequency Selection (DFS) *Supports 802.11d,e,h,i,j,k,r,u, v time stamp, w, z standards *Designed for High Bandwidth Enterprise Wireless Access Points
==Links of Interest== ===Purchase Sample=== [http://shop.compex.com.sg/ Compex System Sample Store]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
